name: UMDBusUpdates(Unofficial)
0:
”Alexa, ask bus updates when the next bus is coming at 10001”
”ask bus updates for the schedule at 10001”
”ask bus updates for 10001”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bus updates
des:
This is an unofficial bus app for the UMD DOTS bus system. You need to know the bus stop ID number so you can ask alexa for information at that stop. You can find bus stop IDs on the nextbus website (nextbus.com). Once you know your bus ID #, you can use the commands to ask alexa when the next available buses will be arriving. The skill will list the arrival times for all the buses at that particular bus stop.

Disclaimer: I am in no way affiliated nor endorsed by the University of Maryland's Department of Transportation Services. UMD Bus updates is an independent project made by me, a UMD graduate student, for all UMD students.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
